correlationId.description: The object ID of the correlation identifier for the specified record.
correlationId.name: correlationId

valid correlation Id.description: An example of a valid correlation ID in type UUID string.

tenantId.description: The object ID of the tenant to operate against.
tenantId.name: tenantId

valid tenant Id.description: An example of a valid tenant ID in type UUID string.

channelName.description: Name of the deploy channel to operate against.
channelName.name: channelName

valid channel name.description: An example string of a valid channel name.

channelRing.description: Integer number representing ring to operate against.
channelRing.name: number

valid channel ring.description: An example integer that represents a valid channel ring.

minimum channel ring.description: An example integer that represents the minimum valid channel ring.

invalid channel ring.description: An example integer that represents an invalid channel ring, which is negative.

Valid version number.description: An example string represents a valid semantic version number.

parentId.description: The object ID of the parent value to operate against.
parentId.name: parentId

Valid parent ID.description: An example UUID string that represents a valid parent object ID.

dateStart.description: Date string to narrow records selection to those created on or after that date.
dateStart.name: dateStart

Valid start date.description: An example ISO8601 date string that represents a valid start date in a query.

dateEnd.description: Date string to narrow records selection to those created before or on that date.
dateEnd.name: dateEnd

Valid end date.description: An example ISO8601 date string that represents a valid end date in a query.

401.description: Principal is not authorized to access this endpoint. Check to make sure the Bearer token is valid and present!

403.description: Principal does not contain the correct scopes (permissions) for the API call that was made, or was made from the wrong tenant. If the permissions were granted, ensure that the access token was requested with the correct scopes.

404.description: The requested object was not found.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server!

503.description: App is starting still. Feature is not available. Please try again later.

525.description: Infrastructure not deployed. Please deploy the infrastructure before using this endpoint.

Core.HealthReport.description: Health report that indicates if a service is down or not that the data gateway relies on.

authClient.description: Flag that indicates if the client side authentication validation is working or not.

authServer.description: Flag that indicates if the server side authentication is working or not.

bulkStorage.description: Flag that indicates if the bulk storage system is down (`false`) or not (`true`). False indicate the service is not working, true indicates the service is working.

database.description: Flag that indicates if the ORM (Database) system is down (`false`) or not (`true`). False indicate the service is not working, true indicates the service is working.

Core.HealthReport.title: Core System - Health Report

Chat.OpenAIChatMessage.title: Chat - Message Record
Chat.OpenAIChatMessage.description: Object representing entity supplied to the AI agent or a response from the AI Agent

type.description: The type of the content part

role.description: The role of the messages author

name.description: An optional name for the participant

tool_calls.description: The tool calls generated by the model, such as function calls

id.description: The ID of the tool call

function.description: The function that the model called

arguments.description: The arguments to call the function with

name.description: The name of the function to call

type.description: The type of the tool. Currently, only `function` is supported

tool_call_id.description: Tool call that this message is responding to

Report.FeatureBreakdown.description:
List of features that are configured for the specific service plan's service configuration for the related principal.
The key is the name of the feature that is being described.
The value is the state of the feature configuration, `true` is in scope and `false` meaning not in scope.
Report.FeatureBreakdown.title: Report - Feature Breakdown

assignedLicense.description: License assignment on the specified principal.

assignedService.description: Service configuration assignment.  This is used to record the set of principals that are "benefiting" from the service, regardless of license status.

consumedService.description: Usage telemetry retrieved for the service to indicate if the specific principal is consuming the service or not, regardless of license status.

LicenseReportV0.LicenseData.description: Collection of principals that have had their in-use licenses and assigned licenses. Where the key is the principal ID and the value is the insights.
LicenseReportV0.LicenseData.title: License Report - License Data

LicenseReportV0.description: Completely calculated license report structure that is the result of a complete run.

availableLicense.description: Breakdown of the purchased licenses/service plans available in the tenant being audited for this run. Where the key is the ID of the service plan and the value is how many licenses are available/purchase for it.
availableLicense.title: License Report - Available Licenses

LicenseReportV0.title: License Report - Complete Object

LicenseReportV1.description: Completely calculated license report V1 structure that is the result of a complete run.

availableLicense.description: Array of license bundles available. Each item includes the total purchased, the unique license bundle ID, and a list of associated service plan list.

count.description: Number of licenses that are purchased of the specific license.

id.description: Well known ID of the license bundle.

items.description: Well known ID of the service plan.

servicePlanList.description: List of available service plans for the current license.

schemaVersion.description: Version number of the license report schema.

LicenseReportV1.title: License Report V1 - Complete Object

Report.CorrelationRecord.description: Metadata that describes the execution session (run) that is used to tie/relate report versions together.

auditTenantAccount.description: The user account used to retrieve the information in the tenant being audited.

correlationId.description: The ID of the execution session (run) that is used to tie/relate all of the data together.

reportTenantAccount.description: User account used to store/report the report to the SHI Lab cloud service.

tenantId.description: Unique ID of customer's Microsoft tenant that the report is auditing.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was last updated.

Report.CorrelationRecord.title: License Report - Correlation Record

Report.PrincipalData.description: Contains user and device records included in the report, detailing assigned services, licenses, consumed services, and related metadata for each principal.

user.title: User Principal Records
user.description: Object containing user records, each keyed by user ID. Includes assigned services, licenses, consumed services, inferred attributes, metadata, and enhanced identity data for each user.

llmInferred.title: Principal Inferred Attributes
llmInferred.description: Inferred principal attributes, showing if the account is a service account, frontline worker, temporary worker.

isServiceAccount.description: Indicates if the account is a service account.

isFrontlineWorker.description: Indicates if the user is a frontline worker.

isTempWorker.description: Indicates if the user is a temporary worker.

enhancedData.title: User Enhanced Identity Data
enhancedData.description: Additional identity details for the user, such as principal name, job title, department, office location, and employee type; present only if customer consented, otherwise null.

device.title: Device Principal Records
device.description: Object containing device records, each keyed by device ID. Includes assigned services, licenses, consumed services, and metadata for each device.

Report.PrincipalData.title: Report - Principal Data

Report.PrincipalData.CommonService.description: Represents a service assignment or usage for a principal, which can be a feature breakdown, a usage count, or null if not applicable.

oneOf.description: Number of in-scope principals or usage count.

Report.PrincipalData.CommonService.title: Report - PrincipalData - Common Service

Report.PrincipalData.AssignedLicense.description: List of licenses assigned to a principal, including license ID and associated service plans.

id.description: Unique identifier for the assigned license.

items.description: Unique identifier for the service plan.

servicePlanList.description: List of service plans associated with the assigned license.

Report.PrincipalData.AssignedLicense.title: Report - PrincipalData - Assigned License

Report.PrincipalData.PrincipalMetadata.description: Metadata about the principal, such as whether the account is a shared.
Report.PrincipalData.PrincipalMetadata.title: Report - PrincipalData - Principal Meta Data

LicenseEntitlement.Shield.description: Record that describes the purchased licenses for a specific tenant. More than one of these can be active at a single time.

correlationId.description: Used to correlate the license entitlements with other records.

enterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseInterfaceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Enterprise Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseUserCount.description: Count of Enterprise Users that are allowed to be managed.

notValidAfter.description: Date that the entitlement expires at.

notValidBefore.description: Date that the entitlement becomes active at.

privilegedDeviceCount.description: Count of Privileged Devices (PAW) that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Privileged Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Privileged Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedUserCount.description: Count of Privileged Users that are allowed to be managed.

purchaseId.description: This could be any value used to correlate the purchase operation to this entitlement record.

specializedDeviceCount.description: Count of Specialized Devices that are allowed to be managed.

specializedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Specialized Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

specializedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Specialized Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

specializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are allowed to be managed.

tenantId.description: Tenant that this license entitlement is valid for.

LicenseEntitlement.Shield.title: License Entitlement - SHIELD Record

enterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseInterfaceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Enterprise Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

enterpriseUserCount.description: Count of Enterprise Users that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedDeviceCount.description: Count of Privileged Devices (PAW) that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Privileged Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Privileged Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

privilegedUserCount.description: Count of Privileged Users that are allowed to be managed.

specializedDeviceCount.description: Count of Specialized Devices that are allowed to be managed.

specializedInterfaceCount.description: Count of Specialized Interfaces that are allowed to be managed.

specializedIntermediaryCount.description: Count of Specialized Intermediaries that are allowed to be managed.

specializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are allowed to be managed.

correlationId.description: Primary key for the table, used to correlate multiple telemetry records together.

enterpriseDeviceCount.description: Count of Enterprise Devices that are deployed in the CX environment.

enterpriseUserCount.description: Count of Enterprise Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

monthlyActiveEntUsers.description: Number of active managed Enterprise users.

monthlyActivePrivUsers.description: Number of active managed privileged users.

monthlyActiveSpecUsers.description: Number of active managed Specialized users.

privilegedDeviceCount.description: Count of Privileged Devices (PAW) that are deployed in the CX environment.

privilegedUserCount.description: Count of Privileged Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

shieldArchitectureVersion.description: Version number of the architecture that is deployed.

shieldCoreVersion.description: Version number of the product that the product is running.

specializedDeviceCount.description: Count of Specialized Devices that are deployed in the CX environment.

specializedUserCount.description: Count of Specialized Users that are deployed in the CX environment.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID for the CX in question.

createdAt.description: Timestamp on when the record was created. This is auto managed by sequelize.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp on when the record was last updated. This is auto managed by sequelize.

Update.Shield.Check.description: Object returning the value of the version of the latest application package available.

updateVersion.description: Latest found version of the application package.

Update.Shield.Check.title: Update SHIELD Check - latest application package version

Update.Shield.Channel.description: Channel configuration for the SHIELD update service.

latest.description: Version number of the latest update available to the chanel.

name.description: (Unique) Name of the update channel that this configuration belongs to.

previous.description: Version number of the number that is being replaced via ring deployment, available to all rings at the minimum.

Update.Shield.Channel.title: SHIELD Update - Channel

latest.description: Flag that indicates if the ring should be operating off of the latest version number provided by the channel (`true`) or the previous (`false`).

number.description: Ring number that this configuration belongs to.

Update.Shield.Channel.Ring.title: Update SHIELD Channel Ring - configuration entry

alphaEnabled.description: Flag that indicates if the current tenant is allowed to request alpha builds (`true`) or not (`false`).

ring.description: Ring number that the client is a member of for the current chanel.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID that the configuration belongs to.

TenantDetails.title: Tenant Details Record
TenantDetails.description: Information about a single tenant record

tenantId.description: The object ID of the tenant record

tenantDisplayName.description: Human readable name for the tenant record

parentId.description: The object ID of the tenant that is considered a parent to this record

authorizedPrincipalList.description: List of object IDs that are allowed to access this record and related data.

ArchitectureReportV1.description: Completely calculated architecture report structure that is the result of a complete run.

schemaVersion.description: Version number of the license report schema.

ArchitectureReportV1.title: Architecture Report V1 - Complete Object

ArchitectureReportV1.TenantMetadata.description: This is the the tenant data calculated for the architecture report

totalDeviceCount.description: The count of total devices within the tenant

totalGuestCount.description: The count of total guests within the tenant

totalMemberCount.description: The count of total members within the tenant

totalUserCount.description: The count of total users within the tenant

ArchitectureReportV1.TenantMetadata.title: Architecture Report V1 - Tenant Metadata

ArchitectureReport.PrincipalData.description: Contains user and device records included in the architecture report, detailing assigned services, licenses, consumed services, and related metadata for each principal.
ArchitectureReport.PrincipalData.title: Architecture Report - Principal Data

CloudMatrix.Correlation.description: Represents a cloud matrix assessment record, including customer, publisher details and correlation record, as well as key timestamps and identifiers.

accountName.description: The name of the customer account associated with this cloud matrix assessment record.

correlationId.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the discovery session associated with this cloud matrix assessment record.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was created.

crmId.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the customer associated with this cloud matrix assessment record.

discoverDate.description: Timestamp of when the discovery process was initiated.

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the discovery process has been completed for this cloud matrix assessment record.

publisher.description: The name of the publisher associated with this cloud matrix assessment record.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the report was last updated.

CloudMatrix.Correlation.title: Cloud Matrix Assessment Record

EntraID.description: The Access Token from Entra ID. Please note required scopes (permissions) in each endpoint.

info.description: Collects data from the various SHI Lab products and makes it available in a standardized way.
info.title: SHI Data Gateway

get.description: Check the health of the various components of the data gateway and report back. Useful for automated health probing.

500.description: Service has a failure described with following report.

Auth system failure.description: An example health report returned indicates the authentication components are not working.

Storage system failure.description: An example health report returned indicates the storage components are not working.

get.summary: Health of the Service for Probing

post.description:
Store the results of a license analytics run.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment. The request body is the License Report that to be stored.

Ignorant License Report Request.description: Clueless dev trying to automate this application without reading the docs. RTFM!

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment. This will return the same report as the request input.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the authenticated tenant. Can use filters targeting creation date to limit results. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific license report.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read`,  `LicenseReport.Read.All`, `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Example Correlation Records.description: Sample list of correlation records for the current authenticated tenant.

get.summary: Retrieve the List of Correlation Records

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the specified tenant. Can use filters targeting creation date to limit results. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific license report.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read.All`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

Example Correlation Records.description: Sample list of correlation records for the specified tenant.

get.summary: Retrieve the List of Correlation Records for Specified Tenant

get.description:
Retrieves the full license report for the specified correlation ID in the authenticated tenant. The license report contains all of the license usage and compliance information with the required correlation data.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read`, `LicenseReport.Read.All`, `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Example License Report.description: Sample, truncated license report from an example customer environment for a correlation record of the current authenticated tenant.

delete.description:
Deletes the full license report for the specified correlation ID.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).
delete.summary: Delete the Specified License Report for the currently authenticated tenant.

get.description:
Retrieves the full license report for the specified correlation ID and tenant. The license report contains all of the license usage and compliance information with the required correlation data.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read.All`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

License Report.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment for a correlation record of the specified tenant.

get.summary: Retrieve the Specified License Report for Specified Tenant

delete.description:
Deletes the full license report for the specified correlation ID and tenant.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.
delete.summary: Delete the Specified License Report for Specified Tenant

post.summary: Inquire License Data from AI Agent
post.description:
Enables a conversation mode with AI agent to request details of the available license reports for the currently authenticated tenant.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseReport.Read`, `LicenseReport.ReadWrite`, `LicenseReport.Read.All`, or `LicenseReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).  This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

schema.description: Collection of conversation parts provided by user to be ingested by the agent

Tool call.description: An example request that represent a message initiated by the chat assistant to call a tool function for the currently authenticated tenant.

messageList.content: Hello
Hello, how can I assist you today?
Can you show me what correlation records I have?
What are the available IDs?

You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

examples.responseText:
You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

messageList.description: List of message objects in current conversation

examples.content: Hello, how can I assist you today?
Can you show me what correlation records I have?

You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

examples:
You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

Chat response.description: An example chat response that includes context of current chat session with the request appended for the currently authenticated tenant.

messageList.content: Hello
Hello, how can I assist you today?
Can you show me what correlation records I have?
What are the available IDs?

You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

value.responseText:
You have correlation records for the following dates:
- July 3, 2025
- July 7, 2025

Would you like to see details from any of these correlation records?

post.description:
Creates a new license entitlement (activation) for SHIELD.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

Specialized Purchase.description: Add-on purchase for the specified customer for some additional specialized licenses.

Initial Purchase.description: Complete suite of components purchased for the specified customer.

Ignorant Entitlement Creation Request.description: Clueless dev trying to automate this application without reading the docs. RTFM!

Small MSP.description: Example license entitlement for a small MSP.

Enterprise.description: Example license entitlement for an enterprise sized company.

post.summary: Creates a new License Entitlement for SHIELD.

get.description: Retrieves the count of licenses that are available to the authenticated tenant. No scopes (permissions) required.

Small MSP.description: Example active license count for a small MSP for the currently authenticated tenant.

No Licenses.description: Example license count for a company that doesn't have any licenses for the currently authenticated tenant..

Enterprise.description: Example active license count for an enterprise sized company for the currently authenticated tenant..

get.description:
Retrieves the list of license entitlements that are assigned to the specified tenant.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.Read.All`, or `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.
get.summary: List of Entitlement Records for Specified Tenant

Example Purchase.description: An example SHIELD entitlement for the specified tenant.

delete.description:
Deletes the requested SHIELD license entitlement record.

This endpoint requires the `LicenseEntitlement.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

post.description:
Submits the telemetry report for SHIELD.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Monthly Report.description: Example monthly telemetry report for an enterprise organization.
An example of latest monthly telemetry report for an enterprise organization after the latest telemetry input.

get.description:
Retrieves the telemetry records that have been reported for the authenticated tenant. Data is not guaranteed to be retrieved in any specific order.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.Read`, `Telemetry.Shield.Read.All`, `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

List of Reports.description: List of all available SHIELD telemetry reports for the current authenticated tenant.

get.description:
Retrieves the telemetry records that have been reported for the specified tenant. Data is not guaranteed to be retrieved in any specific order.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.Read.All`, or `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

List of Reports.description: List of all available SHIELD telemetry reports for the specified tenant.

delete.description:
Deletes the specified telemetry record for the specified tenant.

This endpoint requires the `Telemetry.Shield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

get.description:
Retrieves all of the channel configurations that are present in the update service.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

Channel configuration.description: An example showing the all channel configurations.

500.description: Request has a failure that cannot be resolved and might require manual intervention or retry.

get.description:
Retrieves configuration for the specific channel from the update service.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

Stable channel config.description: An example showing the stable update channel configuration.

Alpha channel config.description: An example showing the alpha update channel configuration.

500.description: Request has a failure that cannot be resolved and might require manual intervention or retry.

patch.description:
Updates (or adds when missing) the specified channel configuration.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

Channel Configuration Details.description: Example channel configuration object that will add/update for specified channel.

latest.description: Version number of the latest update available to the chanel.

previous.description: Version number of the number that is being replaced via ring deployment, available to all rings at the minimum.

Channel Configuration Details.description: Example object returned on creation or update.

500.description: Request has a failure that cannot be resolved and might require manual intervention or retry.

delete.description:
Deletes the specified channel configuration and associated rings.

This endpoint requires the `UpdateShield.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI Lab` tenant. End user access is restricted.

get.description: Retrieves the list of tenant records. Can use filter by parent ID limit the results. This endpoint requires the `Tenant.Read.All` or `Tenant.ReadWrite.All` scopes (permissions).

Example List Of Single Tenant Record.description: Example list of single tenant records which no user is authorized yet.

patch.description: Update tenant record using provided information. Payload could contain any combination of existing properties. To remove a parent, set the parentId to be the same as the tenant ID value. This endpoint requires the `Tenant.ReadWrite.All` scopes (permissions).

tenantDisplayName.description: Human readable name for the tenant record

parentId.description: The object ID of the tenant that is considered a parent to this record

authorizedPrincipalList.description: List of object IDs that are allowed to access this record and related data.

post.description:
Stores the results of an Architecture report.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite`, `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Architecture Report V1.description: Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment. This will return the same report as the request input.
Sample, truncated report from an example customer environment. This will return the same report as the request input.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the authenticated tenant. Can use filters targeting creation date to limit results. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific architecture report.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.Read`,  `ArchitectureReport.Read.All`, `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite`, or `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

Example Correlation Records.description: Sample list of correlation records for the current authenticated tenant.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of correlation records for the specified tenant. Can use filters targeting creation date to limit results. Correlation records store the metadata for a specific architecture report.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.Read.All`, or `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

Example Correlation Records.description: Sample list of correlation records for the specified tenant.

200.description: A list of correlation records for the specified tenant.

delete.description:
Deletes the full architecture report v1 for the specified correlation ID.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite`, or `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).
delete.summary: Delete Architecture Report Data by Correlation ID

get.description:
Retrieves the full architecture report v1 for the specified correlation ID in the authenticated tenant. The architecture report v1 contains all of the tenant metadata and user/device data with the required correlation data.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.Read`, `ArchitectureReport.Read.All`, `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite`, or `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

200.description: The architecture report data for the specified correlation ID.

get.summary: Retrieve the specified Architecture Report V1 by Correlation ID

delete.summary: Delete the specified Architecture Report V1 for specified tenant
delete.description:
Deletes the full architecture report v1 for the specified correlation ID and tenant.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

get.summary: Get Architecture Report v1 Data by Correlation ID and Tenant ID
get.description:
Retrieves the architecture report data associated with the specified correlation ID and tenant ID.

This endpoint requires the `ArchitectureReport.Read.All`, `ArchitectureReport.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission). This endpoint is also only accessible from the `SHI` and `SHI Lab` tenants. End user access is restricted.

200.description: The architecture report data for the specified correlation ID and tenant ID.

get.description:
Retrieves the list of cloud matrix correlation records. Can use filters targeting creation date to limit results. Cloud matrix records store the metadata for a specific cloud matrix correlation.

This endpoint requires the `CloudMatrix.Read`,  `CloudMatrix.Read.All`, `CloudMatrix.ReadWrite`, or `CloudMatrix.ReadWrite.All` scope (permission).

200.description: A list of cloud matrix correlation records.

Example Cloud Matrix Records.description: Sample list of cloud matrix correlation records.
